{{html: 

<head>
<meta http-equiv="Content-Type" content="text/html; charset=utf-8" />
<title>Fady</title>

<script type="text/javascript" src="http://ajax.googleapis.com/ajax/libs/jquery/1.3.2/jquery.min.js"></script>
<script type="text/javascript" src="http://geckohub.com/jquery/youtubeplaylist/jquery.youtubeplaylist.js"></script>

<script type="text/ecmascript">
	
		$(function() {
			$("ul.demo2").ytplaylist({addThumbs:true, autoPlay: false, holderId: 'ytvideo'});
		});
	
</script>
<style type="text/css">
	#ytvideo,
	#ytvideo2 {
		float: left;
		margin-right:10px;
	}


	.yt_holder {
		background: #f3f3f3;
		padding: 10px;
		float: left;
		border: 1px solid #e3e3e3;
		margin-bottom:15px;
	}


	.demo2 {
		float: left;
		margin: 0;
		padding: 0;
		width: 220px;
	}

	.demo2 li {
		list-style-type: none;
		display:block;
		background: #f1f1f1;
		float: left;
		width: 216px;
		margin-bottom: 5px;
		padding:2px;

	}

	.demo2 li img {
		width: 120px;
		float: left;
		margin-right: 5px;
		border: 1px solid #999;
	}

	.demo2 li a {
		font-family: georgia;
		text-decoration: none;
		display: block;
		color: #000;
	}

	.currentvideo {
		background: #e6e6e6;
	}		
</style>
</head>
}}
